You tend to focus on the good, and not let your concerns overwhelm you.
You often worry about things less than other people, particularly the smaller things.
To you, life is an adventure that you're enjoying every moment of.
And sometimes, obsessing over the negative things is something to put aside for a while.
You try your best to comfort others, and show them that things will be okay.
Of course, sometimes this can lead you to tune out important things that you should be focusing on a bit more.
A carefree person like you will be...
